data.title: Weather in Ufa in october: Temperature, Rainfall, Sunshine... for October 2024! - Russia
data.meta_description: Is the climate in Ufa (in Russia) in october good? Discover the weather forecast in october 2024 to prepare your trip.
data.text:
Ufa in october: average Weather, Temperature and Climate

Best time to go to Ufa?

Weather in Ufa in october 2024

The weather in Ufa in october comes from statistical datas on the past years. You can view the weather statistics for all the month, but also by using the tabs for the beginning, the middle and the end of the month.

Evolution of daily average temperature and precipitation in Ufa in october

These charts show the evolution of average minimum/maximum temperatures as well as average daily precipitation volume in Ufa in october.

The climate of Ufa in october is very bad

The weather in october in Ufa is wet (with 89mm of rainfall over 6 days). The weather's not getting better compared to the previous month since in september there is an average of 86mm of precipitation over 5 days.

The climate is quite cold there october. Plan to cover you well! Temperatures are up to 8°C. On average, the recorded minimum temperature is 3°C. Thus, the mean temperature average in october in Ufa is 6°C. These temperatures are far removed from those records observed in Ufa in october with a maximum record of 20°C in 2012 and a minimum record of -12°C in 2014. You can expect to have about 9 days with temperatures down below 0°C, or 29% of time.

On average, in Ufa, the days of october last 10:32. The sun rises at 07:45 and sets at 18:17.

Ufa: another month?

If you can push the dates of your trip to Ufa forward, the month of november has a better weather forecast than october. more information

October: another location in Russia?

If you want to go to Russia in october, there are destinations with better weather than Ufa:

In october, Sochi, Anapa, Gelendzhik, Izberbash, Krasnodar and Makhachkala have good weather.

Finally, Vladivostok, Kaliningrad, Volgograd, Astrakhan, Azov and Belgorod have a tolerable climate, but better than Ufa.

Weather data for Ufa in october:

Weather data for Ufa for october are derived from an average of the weather forecast since 2009 in Ufa. There is a margin of error and these forecasts are to be considered as general information only. The weather in Ufa can vary slightly from year to year, but this data should limit surprises. So you can pack your bags or check for the best time in year to go to Ufa.
